name: anandi3r
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: bitri(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w1)), wa(wa(w0, w2), w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w1)))
-| wb(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wa(wa(w0, w2), w1))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w2), w1), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w1)))
-| wb(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wa(wa(w0, w2), w1))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w2), w1), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w1)))

|- wb(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w1)))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w2), w1), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w1)))

body.origin: |- wb(wa(wa(w0, w2), w1), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w1)))

comment: Distribution of triple conjunction over conjunction. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 4-Nov-2018.)
